events.text:
Now that we're out of [color=#a23e9c]The Void[/color], there is something pertinent you could help me with.
I'm looking for that [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] you released me from.
I know it sounds convoluted but when I'm "released", the [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] and I are cast far and away from one another.
During my usual work, the [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] is my last stop: a one-way ticket back to the [color=#ff0000]Nav[/color].

Really? That's mighty kind of you...
Take a look around, the [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] could practically be anywhere.
My thinking is that it often ends up being found in a cool, dark place.
I know that sounds like a place [color=#0f70ff]Yav folk[/color] stash their oats or explosive agents.
Get creative, my friend!

I knew it. Say no more.
I've already asked you for too much.
See ya when you land in the [color=#ff0000]Nav[/color] one day, buddy!

YES!!!!!
So the [color=#9effef]spiders[/color] made you play Hide & Seek and you found my [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] in the process?
That's just crazy. All that trouble. I probably would've passed on those terms if I were you.
But I gotta thank you a thousand times over for your help once again.
....
You look like something's on your mind again.

Jeez, I'm starting to think you're a bit obsessed with me, much?
Yeah, off-duty [color=#ff0000]Reaper[/color]... that's me.
I was looking for some Enya cassettes in the [color=#0f70ff]Yav[/color] and got my coordinates all messed up.
Believe it or not: [color=#ff0000]Nav folk[/color] do not like to be soothed while they toil in the sweet inferno hereafter...

Oh, those bozos over at the campsite over there?
They're harmless squatters. I wouldn't worry too much.
The [color=#0f70ff]Yav[/color] is a hard place to live in, y'know? I see it in the eyes of newly minted [color=#ff0000]Nav folk[/color] daily.
I don't blame people when there are so many barriers in place. They're doing the best they can.
I mean, do you?
